div.p: Sad to see your resignation with us, but we dont want to lose you, resignation in PeP will be active only for you for 24 hours from your resignation time in tool, if you feel any change in decision, you can take back resignation, else sorry it will be active for further steps of exit process with effective date of your resignation.
